Title: Coronavirus a product of evolution, may have been in humans for years: Study - The Indian Express
Description: According to findings published in the journal Nature Medicine, the virus could have possibly been transmitted from animals to humans much before it was first detected in Wuhan province of China.

Title: NIV Pune Scientists Release India's First Microscopy Image of Novel Coronavirus - The Weather Channel
Description: The picture marks the first imaging exercise from India using a transmission electron microscope (TEM).

Title: US govt reportedly using location data from mobile ads to track coronavirus spread - Business Today
Description: Not only the US but other governments, including that of India, are now tracking citizens to study the coronavirus spread.

Title: Some COVID-19 patients still have virus even after recovery - Kalinga TV
Description: Beijing: Amid the fast-spreading coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, researchers, including one of Indian-origin, have found that half of the patients they treated for mild COVID-19 infection still carried the coronavirus pathogen for up to eight days a

Title: Coronavirus: The four stages of a global pandemic - Pandemic - Economic Times
Description: Over the past few months, the world has been hit by a large scale viral outbreak - coronavirus - that causes covid-19. India has already reported over 950 cases of the virus, and as cases look like rising further, here are the stages of a pandemic and what th…

Title: An online lifeline in Portugal for old ventilators amid coronavirus crisis - Reuters India
Description: As hospitals struggle to cope with a shortage of life-saving ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, a group of volunteers from Portugal launched on Tuesday evening a unique platform hoping to bring old, unused medical equipment back to life.

Title: Indian doctors are pessimistic and are bracing for a tsunami of coronavirus cases - ThePrint
Description: More than a dozen physicians say it’s just a matter of time before coronavirus sweeps India and that the country isn’t ready.

Title: 108-yr-old becomes UKs oldest coronavirus victim - The Hans India
Description: London: A 108-year-old woman, who survived the two World Wars and the outbreak of the Spanish flu,...
